pullrequest.title: Quick fix so that log examples work again

content.raw:
How about building all examples on CI? Gazebo and some other libraries do it, such as Ign-GUI:

#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/src/3afa2577fc7ad6af925003420c7717329ff62aa8/test/integration/ExamplesBuild_TEST.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#ExamplesBuild_TEST.cc-132
